item.title: Some results on the $\pi$-weight of countable Fr\'echet-Urysohn spaces
item.description: arXiv:2512.09614v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: The $\pi$-weight spectrum for countable regular Fr\'echet-Urysohn spaces is the set of uncountable cardinals that are equal to the $\pi$-weight for some such space. We determine this $\pi$-weight spectrum in the standard Miller rational perfect set model and in the Random real model.
item.dc:creator: Alan Dow
